title: (x) Jim Hudson Lexus square sans caps - Alien Encounters {Sean Carmell (self)}
content:
...whatthefont didnt quite hit the mark on this one. Anyone recognize it? Its obviously a bad trace.

...Thank you!!!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202085311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jim%20Hudson_4721.jpg)
author: Mister Tees

comments.content:
looks like eurostile extended bold or a similar face is euromode bold with 125% stretch

In the spirit of unbridled creativity,

Troy Vera  
Kingdom Graphics  
 [http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202085311/http:/www.kingdomgraphics.biz/ "http://www.kingdomgraphics.biz")  
Yahoo IM: kingdom\_graphics  
Skype: kingdom\_graphics

It looks like a familiar free font, possibly from Larabie. I can't remember the name though.

- Lex
Excuse me, Lex, but Mr. Larabie does MUCH better than this.

Sorry - I meant to say that it looked like the original was a Larabie font, before it was scanned, traced, then put through a Flash SWF file at 7pt, then blown up to this size.

- Lex
Ah, I see, I understand now. That would make sense.

...found it!! its called Alien Encounters.

...thanks for all that chimed in !!
